## PromoteDemoteRequest type

Represents the data required for promoting and demoting an item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PromoteDemoteRequest = {
    $type?: string;
    DestinationRepositoryId?: string;
    Instruction?: OperationInstruction;
};
```
